item.title: Table of Content
item.description: Table of Contents Introduction Customizing Introduction Using Hugo’s shortcodes, it’s easy to make your own Table of Contents without ever having to think about it, simply type {{< toc >}} and one will appear manually. Customizing You can also configure the Table of Content on your config.toml, just type the correct parameters and Hugo will take care of it, see more information at: https://gohugo.io/getting-started/configuration-markup/#table-of-contents
